turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I placed an order last week, order number #12345, and I still haven't received a tracking number. I'm getting a little worried.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Hello! I can definitely help with that. Let me pull up order #12345 for you. One moment...

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, thanks. I really need this package soon.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay, I see order #12345. It looks like it shipped out yesterday and the tracking number is XYZ789. You can track it at [tracking website]. It is expected to arrive in 2-3 business days.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Oh, okay! I didn't see that. Maybe I just missed the email. Thanks!

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Actually, yes. I was also wondering about your return policy. If I don't like the item, can I return it? And what's the timeframe?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Yes, most items are eligible for return within 30 days of delivery. The item must be unused and in its original packaging. Some items, like personalized goods or final sale items, are not eligible. To initiate a return, visit our website and go to the 'Returns' section. Does that make sense?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Perfect, thank you so much for your help! You've been great!
